subject: Cruelty to Animals
Football
Dogs
lead_paragraph: The Falcons’ Michael Vick has been indicted on charges that he sponsored and gambled on dogfighting and authorized acts of cruelty against animals on property that he owned.
snippet: The Falcons’ Michael Vick has been indicted on charges that he sponsored and gambled on dogfighting and authorized acts of cruelty against animals on property that he owned.
